name: til-react-2021
description: During your programming journey you will come across questions every day and need to find answers for those questions. Studies have found a [cognitive benefit to journaling](https://psychcentral.com/lib/the-health-benefits-of-journaling/) when learning new content, or balancing between multiple priorities. For many people the act of writing down a problem, the path to finding a solution, and the answer, stimulates pathways in the brain which help in memory recall and problem solving.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
